entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then periods of snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023
